casebody.data:
Scott Ash James ZIRUS, petitioner,
v.
TEXAS; Scott Ash James Zirus, petitioner,
v.
Texas; and Scott Ash James Zirus, petitioner,
v.
Texas. No. 17-5864. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 30, 2017.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas denied.
